metadata.description: From Frustration to Flow: Rebuilding Trust in Conversational AI

hero.title: From Frustration to Flow
hero.subtitle: Rebuilding Trust in Conversational AI
hero.description: Increased automation by 226% and saved €1.34M+ annually

projectSummary.overview: Led end-to-end redesign of Zalando's AI chatbot with 20% intent recognition failure rate. Through research, discovered the core issue was customer distrust, not usability. Architected guided conversational flow with counterintuitive design decisions like simulated thinking delays.

items.title: Increase Automation While Maintaining Quality
items.description: Transform the chatbot from a cost center to a strategic asset

items.title: Reduce Repeat Contacts
items.description: Solve customer problems effectively on first interaction

items.title: Rebuild Customer Trust
items.description: Address psychological barrier preventing chatbot adoption

sections.title: Designing for Trust
sections.content: Users feared 'not typing right keywords'. Solution: eliminate anxiety through guided button-driven experience

sections.title: The Patience Paradox
sections.content: Introduced 3-5 second simulated thinking delay with typing indicator. Made experience feel more human and thoughtful, leading to 60% improvement in user perception

sections.title: Proactive Intelligence
sections.content: System automatically fetches recent orders via API and displays them in carousel. Bot initiates automated refunds directly in conversation

sections.title: Graceful Handovers
sections.content: Chatbot summarizes entire interaction and passes context to human agents, eliminating user's biggest fear

metrics.description: automation rate increase for delivery use cases
CSAT scores rose from ~40% to nearly 70%
